Name: Promise-Breaker
Description: You must break any promises you make to players.
AdvancedDescription: This only applies to player promises, not owners.

Name: Outright Liar
Description: You must break any promises you make to players. You must make at least 1 promise to any newly signed players.
AdvancedDescription: This only applies to player promises, not owners.

Name: Bonus Boy
Description: You must not have any bonuses in any player contract negotiations.
AdvancedDescription: This only counts in contract negotiations, you use bonuses/clauses when buying the player.

Name: Indecisive Leader
Description: You must change your captain after every loss.
AdvancedDescription: This is only for competitive matches.

Name: Old is Gold
Description: You may not have any players under the age of 32 in your starting lineup.

Name: Age Squeeze
Description: Each season the minimum age of players that you can use increases by 1.
AdvancedDescription: The ages starts at 18. This is mainly for long saves.

Name: Age Squeezer
Description: You can only use players between 18 and 32. Each season the lower bound increases and the upper bound decreases by 1.
AdvancedDescription: This is mainly for long saves.

Name: One Man Army
Description: You can only hire an assistant manager - no other coaches or medical staff.
AdvancedDescription: Scouting staff are allowed.

Name: Spanish Roots
Description: Every player you sign must be given a release clause.
AdvancedDescription: When negotiating contracts with existing players, you must give them a release clause too.

Name: High Turnover
Description: You must accept every offer you recieve for players.

Name: Washed Up?
Description: Only sign 35 year old superstars that are out of contract.
AdvancedDescription: You must rely on your own youth intake beyond this.

Name: The Real Slim Shady?
Description: Only sign players with the same name.
AdvancedDescription: This could be the same first name or same second name.

Name: Riches to Rags
Description: Take a club from rich to unsecure but stay successful.

Name: Everyone's a Right-Back?
Description: Every player in your team must naturally be a right back.

Name: Steve Bruce
Description: You must play players with light injuries and play most players out of position.

Name: Tight
Description: Don't pay any transfer fees for players - free signings only.
AdvancedDescription: You can pay agent fees/upfront fees still. So keep a small transfer budget.

Name: Equality
Description: Only sign players the same height as you.
AdvancedDescription: Keep an eye on your youth prospects - they may grow too tall and need to be sold.

Name: Giants
Description: Only sign players the above your height.
AdvancedDescription: Most youth prospects with likely be too short to play - you'll have to wait.

Name: Not Giants
Description: Only sign players the below 5 feet tall.
AdvancedDescription: Keep an eye on your youth prospects - they may grow too tall and need to be sold...

Name: Better for Heading
Description: Only sign players that are bald.

Name: Nuzlocke
Description: Long term injury = dead, release these players. You can only sign one player per window. You can only sign one player from each league throughout your save. Choose wisely.
AdvancedDescription: You cannot scout any players. Trust your gut.

Name: Overly Trusting
Description: Delegate all signings to staff, they will sort out contracts and incomings/outgoings.

Name: Retire the Shirt? Retire the Position.
Description: When a player retires for you, you cannot play a player in that position ever again - change your formation.
AdvancedDescription: For a simple challenge just retire the role used instead.

Name: Basque in the Blood
Description: You can only sign players born in the city/region of your club.

Name: No Rest for the Wicked
Description: You must schedule a friendly if you have no competitive game.
AdvancedDescription: You must have at least 1 game scheduled for every week, even international breaks.

Name: Multicultural
Description: You must have at least 1 player from each continent in your starting lineup.

Name: Wolves it Up
Description: Pick a country. You can only sign players of that nationality.

Name: Believer
Description: You must swap your goalkeeper and striker around at half time of every cup game.

Name: Fast as Fuck
Description: Only sign players with 17+ pace.

Name: Professional Evolved Shootball
Description: Only sign "Offbrand" named players.
AdvancedDescription: e.g. Rolando instead of Ronaldo.

Name: Dog Eat Dog
Description: Release any players that end a match with a rating under 6.0

Name: Money Please?
Description: Offer out any player that gets a rating over 9.3 in a match for sale.

Name: Diamonds in the Rough
Description: You can only sign players from domestic leagues below you.

Name: Not Quite
Description: Only sign players with 14+ crossing. Only sign players under 5ft.

Name: Bad Judge of Character
Description: Pick your player with the lowest Leadership and Teamwork as your captain.

Name: You're a Wizard
Description: Only sign players with first/second names from Harry Potter.

Name: The Blind Leading the Blind
Description: Hide all attributes. Only use performances and analysts to guide your choices.

Name: Tinkerman
Description: Never let a player play 2 consecutive games. Rotate after each game.

Name: Some Men Just Want To Watch the World Burn
Description: Buy your nearest rivals best player every season. Release them.

Name: Learning on the Job
Description: Always have at least one 16 year old player in your starting lineup.

Name: Avengers Assemble
Description: Try and resign as many ex players and possible as coaches.

Name: Same Shit, Different Club
Description: When you move clubs, try and buy as many players from your previous club as possible.
AdvancedDescription: Release clauses may help with this.

Name: Rags to Riches
Description: Starting at a non-league club, aim to get a personal contract worth over 100k a week.
AdvancedDescription: This doesn't necessarily mean with the same club you start with.

Name: Mercenary
Description: When an offer from another club comes in - you have to accept the interview and take the job if they offer more money.
AdvancedDescription: This doesn't necessarily mean with the same club you start with.

Name: One Team Man
Description: You cannot move to any other club in the same continent.

Name: One Man Team
Description: Pick one player in your starting lineup - do everything you can to keep this player with you forever.
AdvancedDescription: If you move clubs you must bring the player with you.

Name: International Hero
Description: You must pick a "small" nation, aim to become its manager, and win a trophy with them.

Name: Man of the World
Description: You must win a major tournament on each continent.

Name: Money Man
Description: Take a club from Insecure to Rich.

Name: What's a Scout?
Description: You cannot hire scouts - you must use coaches to do any scouting you want.

Name: I'm Fine With What I've Got
Description: Never sign a player. Youth intake only.

Name: Goal-Hungry
Description: At the end of a season release every player that hasn't scored a goal.

Name: Stars in your Eyes
Description: All players must be promised/given a Star Player role.

Name: Taskmaster
Description: Only use players with low match sharpness.

Name: Overly Cautious
Description: Instantly sub off any player that gets a yellow.

Name: Overrun in the Midfield
Description: Delegate making substitutions to your Assistant manager .

Name: Reverse Loan Manager
Description: You can only get players in on loan - no buying.

Name: Your Club is My Club
Description: You can only sign players from affiliate clubs.

Name: Lowest in the League
Description: Get your overall wage bill to be the lowest in the league

Name: Start As You Mean To Go On
Description: Your current highest paid character is your new max wage - you cannot spend more on a single player's wages than that.
AdvancedDescription: This is more of a challenge for small clubs than large ones.
